axis2.name: #{Total Cycle Time}
axis2.text: KPI("CT Total", VARIABLE(<%= unit %>), VARIABLE(<%= process %>))

axis2.name: #{Undesired Activity}
axis2.text:
CASE WHEN PU_COUNT("<%= CASE_TABLE %>","_CEL_<%= process %>_ACTIVITIES"."ACTIVITY_<%= language %>","_CEL_<%= process %>_ACTIVITIES"."ACTIVITY_<%= language %>" IN (<%=Undesired%>)) > 0 
THEN 'With Undesired Act.' ELSE 'Without Undesired Act.' END

axis2.name: #{Repetition}
axis2.text:
CASE 
   WHEN COALESCE(PU_MAX("<%= CASE_TABLE %>", ACTIVATION_COUNT("_CEL_<%= process %>_ACTIVITIES"."ACTIVITY_<%= language %>"), 
            "_CEL_<%= process %>_ACTIVITIES"."ACTIVITY_<%= language %>" IN (<%= Repeated %>)),0)
            > 1 
   THEN 'With Repetition'
   ELSE 'Without Repetition'
END

axis2.name: #{AutomationRate}
axis2.text: KPI("Automation Rate PU", VARIABLE(<%= process %>), VARIABLE(<%= language %>), VARIABLE(<%= CASE_TABLE %>), VARIABLE(<%= AutoActivities %>), VARIABLE(<%= AutoTypes %>))

variables.name: filter6
variables.value:
CASE
    WHEN ISNULL("LFA1"."VBUND") = 1 THEN 'External'
    ELSE 'Internal'
END

variables.name: filter7
variables.value:
CASE WHEN ISNULL("EKPO"."LOEKZ") = 1 THEN 'not deleted'
     WHEN "EKPO"."LOEKZ" = 'S' THEN 'locked'
     WHEN "EKPO"."LOEKZ" = 'L' THEN 'deleted'
     ELSE "EKPO"."LOEKZ"
END

variables.title: TIMEFRAME
variables.variableValue:
CASE
WHEN MONTH("VBAK"."ERDAT") IN (10,11,12) THEN YEAR("VBAK"."ERDAT") || ' - Q1'
WHEN MONTH("VBAK"."ERDAT") IN (1,2,3) THEN YEAR("VBAK"."ERDAT") || ' - Q2'
WHEN MONTH("VBAK"."ERDAT") IN (4,5,6) THEN YEAR("VBAK"."ERDAT" ) || ' - Q3'
WHEN MONTH("VBAK"."ERDAT") IN (7,8,9) THEN YEAR("VBAK"."ERDAT") || ' - Q4'
ELSE NULL
END

variables.title: TIMEFRAME
variables.variableValue:
CASE -- 2 digit Month
WHEN MONTH("VBAK"."ERDAT") >= 10
THEN YEAR("VBAK"."ERDAT") ||'-' || MONTH("VBAK"."ERDAT")
ELSE YEAR("VBAK"."ERDAT") ||'-0' || MONTH("VBAK"."ERDAT")
END

variables.title: TIMEFRAME
variables.variableValue:
CASE
WHEN CALENDAR_WEEK("VBAK"."ERDAT") >= 10
THEN YEAR("VBAK"."ERDAT")
--- ADD one Year if we are already in CW 1 at the end of December
+ CASE WHEN MONTH("VBAK"."ERDAT") = 12 AND CALENDAR_WEEK("VBAK"."ERDAT") = 1 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END
|| '-CW-' ||CALENDAR_WEEK("VBAK"."ERDAT")
ELSE YEAR("VBAK"."ERDAT") || '-CW-0' ||CALENDAR_WEEK("VBAK"."ERDAT")
END

variables.title: TIMEFRAME
variables.variableValue:
CASE -- 2 digit Month
WHEN MONTH( "VBAK"."ERDAT" ) >= 10
THEN CASE
WHEN DAY("VBAK"."ERDAT" ) >= 10
THEN YEAR("VBAK"."ERDAT" ) ||'-'|| MONTH("VBAK"."ERDAT" ) ||'-' || DAY("VBAK"."ERDAT" )
ELSE YEAR("VBAK"."ERDAT" ) ||'-'|| MONTH("VBAK"."ERDAT" ) ||'-0' || DAY("VBAK"."ERDAT" )
END
ELSE CASE
WHEN DAY("VBAK"."ERDAT" ) >= 10
THEN YEAR("VBAK"."ERDAT" ) ||'-0'|| MONTH("VBAK"."ERDAT" ) ||'-' || DAY("VBAK"."ERDAT" )
ELSE YEAR("VBAK"."ERDAT" ) ||'-0'|| MONTH("VBAK"."ERDAT" ) ||'-0' || DAY("VBAK"."ERDAT" )
END
END
